comments:
hi,

 I'm reporting this against TPTP as the same launch configuration works when launching from Run or Debug. Launching via Profile... throws the exception as shown:

java.lang.NullPointerException
  at org.eclipse.jdt.junit.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfigurationDelegate.collectExecutionArguments(JUnitLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:316)
  at org.eclipse.pde.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfigurationDelegate.collectExecutionArguments(JUnitLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:118)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.core.LauncherUtility$JUnitPluginConfigurationExtended.collectExecutionArguments(LauncherUtility.java:1407)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.deleg.application.AbstractJUnitPluginDelegate.preLaunch(AbstractJUnitPluginDelegate.java:82)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.jvmti.client.internal.launcher.TIDelegateHelper.launch(TIDelegateHelper.java:229)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.jvmti.client.internal.launcher.TIJUnitPluginDelegate.launch(TIJUnitPluginDelegate.java:32)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.core.LauncherUtility.delegateInit(LauncherUtility.java:1174)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.PrimaryLaunchDelegate.run(PrimaryLaunchDelegate.java:188)
  at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

thanks,
Andrew

*** Plug-in Registry:

TPTP will no longer support profile of JUnit and JUnit Plug-in in TPTP 4.4

Ali, Please use this bug entry to clean up the subject problems.

hi Eugene,

 thats disappointing news - is this a permanent decision? (It seems a useful thing to have)

thanks,
Andrew

Andrew,

JDT currently does not have any external APIs for TPTP to use.  The function will be removed until APIs are exposed by JDT.
btw, the defect request for the exposure of the JDT APIs is:  https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=170233

Fix in CVS - HEAD.
The JUnit and Plug-in JUnit launch items have been removed from the profile launch configuration until JDT exposes the required APIs.

(In reply to comment #4)
> Andrew,
> JDT currently does not have any external APIs for TPTP to use.  The function
> will be removed until APIs are exposed by JDT.

oh ok, thanks, thats good to know :)
